1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Telah menceritakan kepada kami [Muhammad bin Al Harist Al Mishri] berkata, telah menceritakan kepada kami [Yahya bin Rasyid Al Bashri] dari [Yazid] -mantan budak Salamah- dari [Salamah bin Al Akwa'] ia berkata; "Aku melihat Rasulullah shallallahu 'alaihi wasallam berwudlu lalu mengusap kepalanya satu kali

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَسْحِ الرَّأْسِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning wiping the head
